programme.title: Pain Free Golf

programme.title: Pain Free Golf
programme.desc: Lower back pain is an issue that plagues many golfers, and Randall Hunt is on a mission to eliminate that physical limitation.

programme.title: 3 Keys to Every Shot

programme.title: Golf Channel Academy
programme.desc: The 2017 Solheim Cup Captain, Juli Inkster shares her best short game tips. Inkster also demos how to chip effectively from the fairway and the bunker. Learn the fundamentals of ball position, how to shape your irons, and other helpful drills.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Contestants on teams representing the United States and Europe begin their quest to realize a dream and play on golf's grandest stage. Featuring PGA Tour winner Tommy Gainey.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The players get down to business and try to avoid being the first contestant eliminated. The show's signature glass panes challenge is played with a new twist, and the contestants learn about Carnoustie's famous Miller Bunker.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: A rush of national pride consumes the players as they tee it up in their first team, match-play competition to determine who's up for elimination, where it's distance control that determines an unlucky player's fate.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: It's all about accuracy as the contestants test their approach shots and drive for more than just show to stay alive.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Contestants experience deja vu as they try to earn immunity from elimination, while an unfortunate few battle gusty winds and attempt to get a handle on distance control.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Contestants take a surprise field trip to St. Andrews - the bastion of golf - and have to deal with the pressure as an unexpected gallery gathers to watch them perform.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The golf course plays no favorites as both teams find out that sometimes it's not so easy to make par.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: An elimination challenge with a variety of shot results along with an emotional send-off.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The Europeans are faced with a no-win situation and scrap team unity for individual survival. Players get to choose the shot that just may end up proving their demise.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: Nearly impossible bunker shots have the players trying to avoid making spectacles of themselves, while it's a one-on-one contest that determines who stays and who goes.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: A contest designed for national bragging rights keeps the final USA and European contestants focused on team play.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: The remaining two Americans face nine holes of match play - as do their European counterparts - to determine who will play for the championship.

programme.title: The Big Break
programme.desc: National pride and lifelong dreams are at stake as the finalists representing the United States and Europe face off in the championship match.
